name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 256GB
description:
After the successful landing of Samsung Galaxy S22, the next Flagship series phones - Phone Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is the object of great desire by Samfans. Elegant and luxurious design combined with breakthroughs in technology has created the flagship Samsung flagship product.
Is the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra phone anything new?
Samsung S23 Ultra is Samsung's high-end phone line, owning an impressive 200MP camera, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, 8GB RAM memory for outstanding processing performance and luxurious square frame. The product was launched from the beginning of 2023.
High-end design, trendy lines, delicate
Following the design from the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, the Samsung S23 Ultra has a slim appearance with well-cut and extremely delicate lines. With an edge-to-edge screen, a screen-to-body ratio of more than 90%, the S23 Ultra phones promise to bring a trendy design that attracts all eyes.
Still a monolithic back with a borderless camera cluster placed in the top left corner of the familiar Samsung logo located in the lower corner of the back, creating a simple but equally outstanding design for the design. Elegant yet distinctively attractive, simple yet exuding luxury, the Samsung S23 Ultra is definitely the perfect choice when it comes to voting for the top designs in 2023.
The look of the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is endlessly attractive with a variety of colors that are equally elegant, this series of phones immediately creates a new definition of technological beauty for users as soon as they arrive. eye contact.
Besides, Samsung also uses environmentally friendly recycled materials on the S23 Ultra. Accordingly, the glass coating to the paint color are all unique highlights on this flagship model.

name: Xiaomi 12T Pro
description:
Inheriting and developing modern technology from the previous generation of smartphones, Xiaomi 12T Pro promises to bring users an interesting experience. Design highlights, performance, battery life, photo and video capabilities are evident in the following helpful information! Let's find out and go deeper with CellphoneS to find out why Xiaomi 12T Pro is so appreciated!
In addition, if you are interested in the latest version of Xiaomi Mi 12T in the fourth quarter of 2022, there are many attractive offers at CellphoneS.
Xiaomi Mi 12T Pro owns a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1+ processor, 12GB RAM + 256GB internal memory for comfortable storage space. In addition, the 200MP sensor camera cluster and 20MP selfie camera for detailed and sharp photos and videos. Not only that, the AMOLED DotDisplay screen with FHD + resolution with 120Hz refresh rate delivers vibrant, vivid images.
Xiaomi 12T Pro super configuration, stable, fashionable
Xiaomi 12T Pro is a smartphone in the high-end segment that Xiaomi wants to launch this year. In addition to the stylish design, Xiaomi 12T Pro also gives users a super experience thanks to the most powerful chip today. Below are details about Xiaomi's smartphone model.
